## IInteractionGroup interface

Entities in this group have the same requirements as [IHitTestableGroup](./core.ihittestablegroup.md)<!-- -->. Allows up to 32 `IInteractionGroup`<!-- -->s per plot for click / hover handlers etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IInteractionGroup<TUpdateArg, TStore, TTraits extends IHitTestableTrait> extends IEntityGroup<IHitTestableGroupOptions<TUpdateArg, TTraits, TStore>, IHitTestableTrait> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [IEntityGroup](./core.ientitygroup.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IHitTestableGroupOptions](./core.ihittestablegroupoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;TUpdateArg, TTraits, TStore&gt;, [IHitTestableTrait](./core.ihittestabletrait.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Remarks

`IInteractionGroup`<!-- -->s should share `IHitTestableGroup`<!-- -->s to avoid duplicate work. Each entity is allowed a single [IHitTestableGroup](./core.ihittestablegroup.md) shared between all `IInteractionGroup`<!-- -->s but may have a unique [IHitAllowedComponent](./core.ihitallowedcomponent.md) per group.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [groupMask](./core.iinteractiongroup.groupmask.md) | number | Must be unique to identify the group. |
|  [hitAllowedComponentStore](./core.iinteractiongroup.hitallowedcomponentstore.md) | [IEntityComponentStore](./core.ientitycomponentstore.md)<!-- -->&lt;[TEntityTrait](./core.tentitytrait.md)<!-- -->&lt;TUpdateArg, [IHitTestableTrait](./core.ihittestabletrait.md)<!-- -->&gt;, [IHitAllowedComponent](./core.ihitallowedcomponent.md)<!-- -->&lt;TUpdateArg, [IHitTestableTrait](./core.ihittestabletrait.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt; |  |
|  [hitTestableGroup](./core.iinteractiongroup.hittestablegroup.md) | [HitTestableGroup](./core.hittestablegroup.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IPlotRange](./core.iplotrange.md)<!-- -->, TUpdateArg, TStore&gt; |  |
